WorkItem.Description: I may be missing something - basically I want to read through a spreadsheet, and use the content to update some fields on a database etc. I figured the easiest way would be to use toArray() to get it into an array, and then just work through rows and columns, for relevant data. Unfortunately it displays a date ( 07/02/2008 00:00:00 ) as ( 2008200820082008/FebFeb/ThuThu 0000:FebFeb:thth ) . Any help will be appreciated
